Hushh
APPL
$(FLUTTER_BUILD_NAME)
Editor
$(FLUTTER_BUILD_NUMBER)
YES
Hushh may request access to your music library to personalize your experience. We do not collect, store, or share your music data. Your choices remain private and secure.
Hushh uses your calendar only to help you manage events and reminders within the app. We never access, store, or share your calendar data with anyone.
Hushh needs camera access to scan QR codes and enhance your profile. We do not store or share your photos or camera data. Your privacy is always protected.
Hushh requests access to your contacts only to help you connect with people you know. We never use your contacts for any other purpose, nor do we share them with anyone.
Hushh uses Face ID solely for secure authentication. Your biometric data never leaves your device and is never shared or stored by Hushh.
Hushh may sync with Apple Health to provide you with better insights and personalized experiences. Your health data is never used for any other purpose or shared with third parties.
Hushh may sync with Apple Health to provide you with better insights and personalized experiences. Your health data is never used for any other purpose or shared with third parties.

Hushh uses your location to provide personalized, location-based services while you use the app. Specifically, we use your location to: (1) Show you nearby stores, restaurants, and businesses with available offers and discounts, (2) Display location-specific content and recommendations based on your current city or region, (3) Help you find local agents and services in your area, and (4) Automatically set your country and region for better app experience. Your location data is processed locally and is never shared with third parties.

Hushh uses your location to provide personalized, location-based services. Specifically, we use your location to: (1) Show you nearby stores, restaurants, and businesses with available offers and discounts, (2) Display location-specific content and recommendations based on your current city or region, (3) Help you find local agents and services in your area, and (4) Automatically set your country and region for better app experience. Your location data is processed locally and is never shared with third parties.

Hushh uses your location to provide personalized, location-based services while you use the app. Specifically, we use your location to: (1) Show you nearby stores, restaurants, and businesses with available offers and discounts, (2) Display location-specific content and recommendations based on your current city or region, (3) Help you find local agents and services in your area, and (4) Automatically set your country and region for better app experience. Your location data is processed locally and is never shared with third parties.
Hushh may request microphone access for features like voice input. We never record, store, or share your audio data. Your privacy is always protected.
Hushh uses motion data only to enhance your in-app experience. We do not collect, store, or share your motion data with anyone.
Hushh requests access to your photo library only so you can upload photos to your profile. We never access, store, or share your photos for any other reason.
Hushh uses reminders only to help you manage tasks within the app. We do not collect, store, or share your reminders with anyone.
Hushh may use speech recognition to enable voice features. Your voice data is processed securely and never shared or stored by Hushh.

Hushh uses this permission to provide you with a personalized experience and relevant content. This helps us improve our services and show you offers that match your interests. Your data is never shared with third parties without your consent.
LaunchScreen
Main
media

Users can permanently delete their account and all personal data from within the app. This includes profile, chat, cards, wallet, settings, and activity history. Data is never retained or shared after deletion. This action is irreversible and ensures full user control over their information.
